title: Video & New: Captain Murphy – Duality Mixtape
content:
For some reason when I was first introduced to the music of Captain Murphy, I passed him off as just another Brainfeeder Mc with slightly too much experimentation, and too little heart.

Maybe I was burned out on Jeremiah Jae, but whatever the reason, I was very, very wrong.

The debut mixtape from the mysterious rapper Captain Murphy could very well cement him as a real game changer. First case in point, the presentation of his record, a bafflingly dark 35-minute video piece that arrogantly poses more questions than it answers.  More than anything, what’s remarkable is the now (vaguely) infamous mystery surrounding the man’s identity itself; no one has any idea who he is. Sure, we’ve seen/heard/been bored by this all before, but once you include that the names that are being banded about more than any are Flying Lotus himself and the annoyingly omnipresent Tyler the Creator, and you’ve rather unwittingly stumbled onto the most tantalising of mysteries.

For the record, i’m CONVINCED it’s Flylo.

I’ll assume by this point you’re slightly interested, so click HERE to stream his debut mixtape and after check out his earlier work with EARL and FlyLo HERE.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
